page.title: 05Family Leisure Time.
page.content: There are 4 members in my family,my dad who is 33,my mum who is 32, my brother who is 12 in 3 months.My family and I make good use of our {leisure}time.My dad has his own business as a slater and tiler.My mum works as housekeeper for Mr.Charlton at the Linnels.We like playing space invaders.We go for walks,do gardening,go swimming and see pantomimes.Normally when I come home from school I change and help mum.I do my homework and have tea,then we all wash up.Mum has a rest for she has had a hard day at work.My dad does gardening.In our{spare time}my brother and I play tennis or football.I have piano lessons from a lady called Christine.Once a week I go to Brownies, held at Hexham Salvation Army from 5.30 till 6.45 on a Thursday and I really enjoy it. By{Toni Lee.
